name: .KPG File Extension
summary: Learn about .KPG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Image file edited and saved in Kai's Power Goo, a program used for warping and distorting images; works best for altering digital photos.

content: Metacreations originally developed Kai's Power Goo then sold it to ScanSoft. Then, Nuance Communications acquired ScanSoft.
